name: Milo Digital
description:
Milo Digital is a highly-skilled team of interactive developers in Los Angeles, engineering digital creative for clients and brands of all sizes (including Capital One, GameStop, Dell, AT&T and more).
Working with agency partners, production shops, and direct clients, our development team maintains an unparalleled depth and breadth of technical knowledge and industry insight we can leverage for your next project. 
Our clients consider us their "go-to resource" for tech and internet marketing - a relationship we both cherish and respect.
